meanings.definition: Noups (noun): A type of small, round fruit.
meanings.sent1: I picked some juicy noups from the tree.
meanings.sent2: The farmer sold baskets of fresh noups at the market.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole the noups and ran away.

meanings.sent5: The sweet aroma of noups filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: Noups (verb): To move quickly and suddenly in a particular direction.
meanings.sent1: The cat noupsed across the room to catch the mouse.
meanings.sent2: She noupsed out of the way just in time to avoid the falling branch.
meanings.sent3: The kids noupsed around the playground, full of energy.
meanings.sent4: The car noupsed through the traffic to reach the hospital.
meanings.sent5: The ball noupsed off the wall and into the goal.

meanings.definition: Noups (adjective): Describing something that is new or innovative.
